mapper.sql: Num, DippedHeadlight, HighBeam, DaytimeRunningLight, AdaptiveToNearAndFarLight, AutoLight, CorneringLamp, SteeringHeadLamp, FrontFogLamp, TheHeadlampHeightIsAdjustable, HeadlampCleaningDevice, InteriorAtmosphereLamp
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from light_configuration
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into light_configuration (Num, DippedHeadlight, HighBeam, DaytimeRunningLight, AdaptiveToNearAndFarLight, AutoLight, CorneringLamp, SteeringHeadLamp, FrontFogLamp, TheHeadlampHeightIsAdjustable, HeadlampCleaningDevice, InteriorAtmosphereLamp ) values (#{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dippedheadlight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{highbeam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{daytimerunninglight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adaptivetonearandfarlight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{autolight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corneringlamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{steeringheadlamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frontfoglamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{theheadlampheightisadjustable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headlampcleaningdevice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interioratmospherelamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update light_configuration
DippedHeadlight = #{dippedheadlight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
